1.3.name: wordpress/easy-social-media
1.3.description:
Ever get tired of having a different plugin for each social media site or having one with so many options you never get it configured? The Easy Social Media Plugin was designed with you in mind. After you activate the plugin just enter your information into a few fields, place the easy social widget where you want it to appear and your done.

After each post you will have buttons so your visitors can share your content on Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Google+, Pintrest & Stumbleupon while the widget gives you links back to all your social media sites.
